modules.description: This module facilitates precise bidirectional transformations between perceptually uniform color models (including cylindrical and Cartesian variants) and device-dependent representations like RGB, XYZ, and hexadecimal encodings. It operates on structured records for each color space, ensuring type-safe conversions and providing customizable precision control during serialization for applications requiring accurate color representation in design tools, visualization pipelines, or cross-format color consistency validation. The inclusion of human-readable formatting utilities further supports debugging and interoperability workflows where explicit numeric transparency is critical.

This module converts between float triples and various color space records like HSLUV, HPLUV, RGB, XYZ, LUV, and LCH. Each function directly maps a tuple of three floats to a corresponding color representation or reverses the process. These conversions are useful when interfacing with libraries or APIs that expect color values in specific formats, such as graphics tools or color conversion utilities.
